org.hibernate.search.analyzer.spi

Interface AnalyzerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Elasticsearch2AnalyzerStrategy, Elasticsearch52AnalyzerStrategy, LuceneEmbeddedAnalyzerStrategy

    public interface AnalyzerStrategy
    A strategy for applying analyzers.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling, Yoann Rodiere
    Experimental
    This type is under active development as part of the Elasticsearch integration. You should be prepared for incompatible changes in future releases.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScopedAnalyzerReference.Builder buildScopedAnalyzerReference(AnalyzerReference initialGlobalAnalyzerReference)
      Creates a ScopedAnalyzerReference builder.

      Map<String,AnalyzerReference> createProvidedNormalizerReferences()

      Initializes references created by this strategy, i.e.

    • Method Detail

      • createDefaultAnalyzerReference

        AnalyzerReference createDefaultAnalyzerReference()
        Returns:
        a reference to the default analyzer, the one to be used when no specific configuration is set on a given field.

      • createPassThroughAnalyzerReference

        AnalyzerReference createPassThroughAnalyzerReference()
        Returns:
        a reference to an analyzer that applies no operation whatsoever to the flux. This is useful for queries operating on non-tokenized fields.

      • createProvidedAnalyzerReferences

        Map<String,AnalyzerReference> createProvidedAnalyzerReferences()
        Returns:
        a map of named references to provided analyzers, i.e. those that we know for sure will be available.

      • createNamedAnalyzerReference

        AnalyzerReference createNamedAnalyzerReference(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the analyzer to be referenced.
        Returns:
        a reference that will be initialized later.

      • createLuceneClassAnalyzerReference

        AnalyzerReference createLuceneClassAnalyzerReference(Class<?> analyzerClass)
        Parameters:
        analyzerClass - The analyzer class the reference should reference.
        Returns:
        a reference to an instance of the given analyzer class that will be initialized later.

      • createProvidedNormalizerReferences

        Map<String,AnalyzerReference> createProvidedNormalizerReferences()
        Returns:
        a map of named references to provided normalizers, i.e. those that we know for sure will be available.

      • createNamedNormalizerReference

        AnalyzerReference createNamedNormalizerReference(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the normalizer to be referenced.
        Returns:
        a reference that will be initialized later.

      • createLuceneClassNormalizerReference

        AnalyzerReference createLuceneClassNormalizerReference(Class<?> analyzerClass)
        Parameters:
        analyzerClass - The analyzer class the reference should reference.
        Returns:
        a reference to an instance of the given analyzer class that will be initialized later.

      • initializeReferences

        void initializeReferences(Collection<AnalyzerReference> analyzerReferences,
                          Map<String,AnalyzerDef> mappingAnalyzerDefinitions,
                          Collection<AnalyzerReference> normalizerReferences,
                          Map<String,NormalizerDef> mappingNormalizerDefinitions)
        Initializes references created by this strategy, i.e. make them point to the actual analyzer/normalizer definition.
        Parameters:
        analyzerReferences - The analyzer references to initialize, gathered through calls to methods of this strategy.
        mappingAnalyzerDefinitions - The analyzer definitions gathered through the Hibernate Search mappings.
        normalizerReferences - The normalizer references to initialize, gathered through calls to methods of this strategy.
        mappingNormalizerDefinitions - The normalizer definitions gathered through the Hibernate Search mappings.

      • buildScopedAnalyzerReference

        ScopedAnalyzerReference.Builder buildScopedAnalyzerReference(AnalyzerReference initialGlobalAnalyzerReference)
        Creates a ScopedAnalyzerReference builder.
        Parameters:
        initialGlobalAnalyzerReference - The global analyzer to set initially on the builder.
        Returns:
        A ScopedAnalyzerReference builder. The returned reference will be initialized later.
